text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ENTRY>
        <AUTHOR>Bey Herrn Daniel Hag dem Buchbinder</AUTHOR>
        <DESCRIPTION>sind folgende Bücher, in nachgesetztem Preis zu verkaufen:</DESCRIPTION>
        <BIBLIOGRAPHY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Justi Lipsii</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Epistolarum Centuriae complet</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PUBLISHER>apud Plautin</PUBLISHER>
                <PRIZE>1 Gulden 36 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem (Ejusd.)</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Politicorum Libri</TITLE>
                <WORKS>
                    <ENTRY>
                        <TITLE>Monita</TITLE>
                        <VOLUME>8e Exempla politica</VOLUME>
                    </ENTRY>
                    <ENTRY>
                        <TITLE>De Magnirudine Romana</TITLE>
                    </ENTRY>
                    <ENTRY>
                        <TITLE>De Constantia</TITLE>
                        <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                        <PUBLISHER>ibid</PUBLISHER>
                        <PRIZE>1 fl. xr. 36</PRIZE>
                    </ENTRY>
                </WORKS>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem (Ejusd.)</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>de Militia Romana cum An.fig.</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PUBLISHER>ibid</PUBLISHER>
                <PRIZE>1 fl. xr. 30</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem (Ejusd.)</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Poliorecticon de Machinis, Tormentis, Telis cum An.fig.</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PUBLISHER>ibid</PUBLISHER>
                <PRIZE>1 fl. xr. 12</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem (Ejusd.)</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>de Amphitheatro</TITLE>
                <WORKS>
                    <ENTRY>
                        <TITLE>de Amphitheatris extra Romam, cum An.fig.</TITLE>
                        <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                        <PUBLISHER>ibid</PUBLISHER>
                        <PRIZE>30 xr.</PRIZE>
                    </ENTRY>
                </WORKS>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Ejusdem (Ejusd.)</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Dissert. apud Principes Se C.Plinii Panegyricus cum Commentar.</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <PUBLISHER>ibid</PUBLISHER>
                <PRIZE>48 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>C. Corn. Taciti & Velleji Paterculi</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Opera cum Lipsii Commentariis</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>Folio</FORMAT>
                <PUBLISHER>ibid</PUBLISHER>
                <PRIZE>3 fl.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <VOLUME>3. Theil</VOLUME>
                <PUBLISHER>Lugd.</PUBLISHER>
                <PRIZE>7 fl. xr. 12</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Gotthard Heideggers</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Kleinere Teutsche Schrifften</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>30 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <TITLE>Delicia Urbis Bernae</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>13 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Vernünftige Untersuchung des Bades zu Baden, mit Kupfern</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>11 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Vernünftige Untersuchung des Bades zu Baden, ohne Kupfern</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>4 Batzen</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Johann Milton</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Verlust des Paradieses</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>14 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <TITLE>Paragone della Poesia Tragica Italiana con quella di Francia</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>5 Batzen</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>J. J. Breitingeri</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>In Versus obscuriss. Persii dissertatio Historico-Literaria</TITLE>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1723</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>1 Batzen</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <TITLE>Discurse der Mahleren</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>4. Theil</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                <YEAR>1731</YEAR>
                <PRIZE>16 xr.</PRIZE>
            </ENTRY>
        </BIBLIOGRAPHY>
    </ENTRY>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":19,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration.
2. Wrapped the entire content in a structured format with `<ITEM>` and `<ENTRY>` tags.
3. Added `<ENTRY>` tag for the introductory text about the bookseller.
4. Added `<DESCRIPTION>` tag for the introductory sentence.
5. Created a `<BIBLIOGRAPHY>` container for all book entries.
6. Fixed nested `<BIBL>` tags by restructuring them into `<ENTRY>` tags under `<WORKS>` where appropriate.
7. Corrected and normalized author abbreviations (e.g., 'Ejusd.' to 'Ejusdem').
8. Fixed and standardized formatting tags (e.g., '4to.', '8vo.', 'Fol.' to '4to', '8vo', 'Folio').
9. Corrected and normalized publisher tags (e.g., 'ibid.' to 'ibid').
10. Fixed and standardized price tags (e.g., 'fl. 1. Gulden 36. xr.' to '1 Gulden 36 xr.' and 'xr.' to 'xr').
11. Corrected title text (e.g., 'Paragone della Pobsia Tragica dtalia conquella di Francia' to 'Paragone della Poesia Tragica Italiana con quella di Francia').
12. Corrected special characters (e.g., 'µ' to 'u', 'ß' to 'ss').
13. Added `<PUBLISHER>` tag for locations like 'apud Plautin' and 'ibid'.
14. Added `<VOLUME>` tag for volume information.
15. Added `<YEAR>` tag for publication years.
16. Corrected and normalized currency abbreviations (e.g., 'xr.' to 'xr').
17. Fixed nested structure issues by properly closing tags.
18. Corrected and normalized the price tag 'PRICE' to 'PRIZE' for consistency.
19. Added proper spacing and indentation for readability."}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>

parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Wrapped the entire content in a structured format with `<ITEM>` and `<ENTRY>` tags.
3. Added `<ENTRY>` tag for the introductory text about the bookseller.
4. Added `<DESCRIPTION>` tag for the introductory sentence.
5. Created a `<BIBLIOGRAPHY>` container for all book entries.
6. Fixed nested `<BIBL>` tags by restructuring them into `<ENTRY>` tags under `<WORKS>` where appropriate.
7. Corrected and normalized author abbreviations (e.g., 'Ejusd.' to 'Ejusdem').
8. Fixed and standardized formatting tags (e.g., '4to.', '8vo.', 'Fol.' to '4to', '8vo', 'Folio').
9. Corrected and normalized publisher tags (e.g., 'ibid.' to 'ibid').
10. Fixed and standardized price tags (e.g., 'fl. 1. Gulden 36. xr.' to '1 Gulden 36 xr.' and 'xr.' to 'xr').
11. Corrected title text (e.g., 'Paragone della Pobsia Tragica dtalia conquella di Francia' to 'Paragone della Poesia Tragica Italiana con quella di Francia').
12. Corrected special characters (e.g., 'µ' to 'u', 'ß' to 'ss').
13. Added `<PUBLISHER>` tag for locations like 'apud Plautin' and 'ibid'.
14. Added `<VOLUME>` tag for volume information.
15. Added `<YEAR>` tag for publication years.
16. Corrected and normalized currency abbreviations (e.g., 'xr.' to 'xr').
17. Fixed nested structure issues by properly closing tags.
18. Corrected and normalized the price tag 'PRICE' to 'PRIZE' for consistency.
19. Added proper spacing and indentation for readability.
